ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set holds 1-min resolution proton distributions
(19 5-deg pitch angles vs. 24 energies) from the Proton Telescope (PROTEL) 
on the CRRES spacecraft.  The energy range covered is 1-100 MeV.  The data 
are in SGI(UNIX) binary format.  Read software is contained within the 
companion documentation.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Gary Mullen at AFRL.

InformationURL.Name: AFRL Descriptive Document
InformationURL.Description:
AFRL document authored by Donald Brautigam on HEEP and PROTEL, 
now a readme at nssdcftp.
